name: Clear Blue Interactive
overview:
Clear Blue Interactive, the innovative technology company aimed at leveraging collaboration technologies and “wiki” community principles to turn public records into useful social media, announced today the official launch of its business as well as its corporate website.

Clear Blue Interactive aims at turning this virtually meaningless data into social media that can be reused to propagate knowledge.” Clear Blue Interactive expects most of its revenue to be generated through data subscription services. The company is in the process of establishing an Advisory Board made up of experts in the fields of knowledge management and collaborative technologies. The launch of Clear Blue Interactive’s Synapse technology is planned for later this year accompanied by the first live online implementation of the technology in a production environment. The new Synapse technology is expected to be the next break-through solution to harvesting the “deep web” since the latest implementation of indexing algorithms by major search engines.

acquisition.source_description: BSA Satellink Announces Acquisition of Clear Blue Interactive, Key Management Changes, Planned Name Change, and Board Additions
